column2: Many Ancients are part of the Cenarion Circle. You can ask one of them to mark you with their power.
column4: Viele Urtümer sind Teil des Zirkels des Cenarius. Ihr könnt einen von ihnen bitten, Euch mit seiner Kraft zu versehen.

column2: Train with Archdruids
One of the purposes of Cenarion Circle is to spread druidic knowledge to people of Azeroth. You can ask them for training, increasing your class level in the process.
column4: Einer der Zwecke des Zirkels des Cenarius ist es, druidisches Wissen an die Bewohner Azeroths weiterzugeben. Ihr könnt sie um Training bitten und dabei Euer Klassenlevel erhöhen.

column2: Train Young Druid
You have trained many new druids in the Cenarion Circle. Maybe you should invite one of them to join your court ?
column4: Ihr habt viele neue Druiden im Zirkel des Cenarius ausgebildet. Vielleicht solltet lhr einen von ihnen einladen, sich Eurem Hof anzuschließen?

column2: Build Cenarion Enclave
Invite your fellow members to create a Cenarion Enclave in your lands.
column4: Ladet Eure Mitmitglieder ein, eine Enklave des Cenarius in Euren Ländern zu gründen.

column2: Raise Host of the Wilds
Cenarion Circle has many powerful creatures of forest among its members. Now in the time of war you can unleash them upon enemies of Azeroth.
column4: Der Zirkel des Cenarius hat viele mächtige Waldgeschöpfe unter seinen Mitgliedern. Jetzt, in der Zeit des Krieges, könnt Ihr sie gegen die Feinde Azeroths einsetzen.

column2: Cenarion Circle

Named in honor of the demigod Cenarius, the Cenarion Circle ensures the protection of nature and its creatures. Furthermore, the members of this faction act as keepers of ancient lore and pay particular attention to the traditional ways of the druids. In their role of protectors of nature, the men and women of the Cenarion Circle also strive to maintain the fragile balance within the world.
column4: Der Zirkel des Cenarius, der zu Ehren des Halbgottes Cenarius benannt wurde, gewährleistet den Schutz der Natur und ihrer Geschöpfe. Darüber hinaus fungieren die Mitglieder dieser Fraktion als Hüter der alten Überlieferungen und achten besonders auf die traditionellen Wege der Druiden. In ihrer Rolle als Beschützer der Natur streben die Männer und Frauen des Zirkels des Cenarius auch danach, das empfindliche Gleichgewicht in der Welt zu erhalten.

Sisterhood of Elune

The Sisterhood of Elune could be the oldest night elf religious and magical order, predating the quel'dorei by some 2,000 years. As the name implies, they are an order of priestesses dedicated to the worship and servitude of the moon goddess, Elune. The Sisterhood is led by the High Priestess of Elune while the priestesses of Moon are the elite of the organization. They have existed long before the Great Sundering, and formal worship dates back about 15,000 years.
column4: Die Schwesternschaft von Elune könnte der älteste religiöse und magische Orden der Nachtelfen sein, seit etwa 2.000 Jahren vor der Quel'dorei. Wie der Name schon sagt, handelt es sich um einen Priesterinnenorden, der der Verehrung und dem Dienst an der Mondgöttin Elune gewidmet ist. Die Schwesternschaft wird von der Hohepriesterin von Elune geleitet, während die Mondpriesterinnen die Elite der Organisation sind. Sie existieren schon lange vor der großen Teilung, und die offizielle Anbetung reicht etwa 15.000 Jahre zurück.

column2: Libram of Protection
This Libram is among the church's most ancient relics. It was given to Turalyon by Alonsus Faol, who challenged him to become living embodiment of what this holy tome represents.
column4: Dieser Foliant zählt zu den ältesten Relikten der Kirche. Er wurde Turalyon von Alonsus Faol geschenkt, der ihn dazu aufrief, die Verkörperung dessen, was dieser heilige Band darstellt, zu werden.

column2: You start preparing the ritual to honor local elementals. First you choose hill known for having strong connection to elements and spirit as place of your ritual. There is also a question of who will oversee the ceremony.
I will ask local shaman for help.
I will do it by myself.

Nearly everything needed for the ritual is prepared. Only thing you still lack are traditional offerings for the elementals. Shaman explains to you that according to tradition you should be the one to gather them. However should someone of your status gather flowers and rocks ?
Buy them from the alchemist.
I will gather them myself as tradition commands.
Nearly everything needed for the ritual is prepared. Only thing you still lack are traditional offerings for the elementals.
I will gather them myself as tradition commands.

After gathering all ingredients you journey to the nearby hill.After few hours of travel you arrive at your destination. Despite the fact that the hill looks unimpressive you can feel the presence of the elemental spirits all around you.
Start the ceremony.

After quick preparation the ritual has started. Nearly a hour has passed but slowly elementals has started gathering on the hill. They look at you silently, waiting for you to talk. You thank them for their help, for this land in which your people live. In response you you see a beatiful spectacle, the elementals dancing all around you in perfect harmony.
Our land will prosper with help of the spirits.
I'm honored.

After quick preparation the ritual has started. Nearly a hour has passed but slowly elementals has started gathering on the hill. They look at you silently, waiting for you to talk. You ask for their help, so this land will thrive like never before. In response you you see a terrific spectacle. The ground is shaking, the sky is roaring and flooding the land with rain.
What have we done !
What have I done !

You start the the ritual with placing the gifts on the altar, after that you close your eyes and wait. Some time later you can see several transparent humanoid shapes forming before your eyes. They seem to wait for you to talk.
I seek power to destroy my enemies.
I seek guidance from my forefathers.
I seek wisdom of those before me.
After hearing your pleas the spirits of your ancestors quickly vanish, leaving you with nothing more than a positive fealing that you have been heard.
I will not bring shame to our name !
I will bring prosperity to our lands !
I will pass this wisdom to my descendants !

You gathered with elders to prepare ritual to the venerable Earth Mother. One of them suggested that we should focus on her left eye Mu'sha instead. He was however countered by proposition to honor An'she, the rigth eye. After long argument, elders look to you for decision.
Prepare a ritual to Eart Mother.
Prepare a ritual to Mu'sha.
Prepare a ritual to An'she.
After long ceremonies and prayers, the ritual has finnaly come to an end. With each minute you can feel something changing within you. It seems you have truly been blessed.
I'm thankful for your protection.
May the Moon's light protect me.
May the Sun's light protect me.
Powerful elementals can be a great help in dire times. What kind of elemental you seek help from ?
I will seek help from earth elemental.
I will seek help from water elemental.
I will seek help from air elemental.
I will seek help from fire elemental.
I will seek help from ice elemental.
I will seek help from sand elemental.

You journey to nearby cave which is a dwelling of powerful earth elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of earth appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with spirit of earth.
What will be his answer ?
Earth elemental starts channeling his power of earth into you. You feel its warmth and strength. You feel that your connection to earth is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Earth elemental starts channeling his power of earth into you. You feel its might as the ground starts shaking. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the cave before it closes.
What have i done wrong ?
Earth elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his mistress, Therazane the Stonemother. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to nearby underwater cave which is a dwelling of powerful water elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of water appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with spirit of water.
What will be his answer ?
Water elemental starts channeling his power of water into you. You feel its calm and strength. You feel that your connection to water is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Water elemental starts channeling his power of water into you. You feel its might as the water starts flowing into the cave. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the cave before it submerges underwater.
What have i done wrong ?
Water elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Neptulon the Tidehunter. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to nearby fire chasm which is a dwelling of powerful fire elemental. After entering it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of fire appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with spirit of fire.
What will be his answer ?
Fire elemental starts channeling his power of fire into you. You feel its passion and strength. You feel that your connection to fire is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Fire elemental starts channeling his power of fire into you. You feel its might as the lava starts exploding from the ground. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the chasm before it's filled with lava.
What have i done wrong ?
Fire elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Ragnaros the Firelord. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to nearby hill which is a dwelling of powerful air elemental. After climbing it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of air appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with spirit of air.
What will be his answer ?
Air elemental starts channeling his power of air into you. You feel its freedom and strength. You feel that your connection to air is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Air elemental starts channeling his power of air into you. You feel its might as the winds blow all around you. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape the hill before it's destroyed by powerful winds.
What haveI done wrong?
Air elemental offers you power in exchange for serving his master, Al'Akir the Windlord. It looks at you awaiting an answer. Rejecting him might not be the best choice.
I will serve in exchange for power.
I will never be a slave.

You journey to nearby glacier which is a dwelling of powerful ice elemental. After climbing it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of ice appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with element of ice.
What will be his answer ?
Ice elemental starts channeling his power of ice into you. You feel power of frost all around you. You feel that your connection to ice is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Ice elemental starts channeling his power of ice into you. You feel its might as the frost creeps troughout your body. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape before elemental turns into icicle.
What have i done wrong ?

You journey to nearby dune which is a dwelling of powerful sand elemental. After arriving at it, you call to him asking for his help. A mighty and majestic creature of sand appears before you. It looks at you waiting for you to speak. You ask for his help with strengthtening your bond with element of sand.
What will be his answer ?
Sand elemental starts channeling his power of sand into you. You feel power of sand shifting below your feet. You feel that your connection to sand is stronger then ever before.
I'm thankful for this power.

Sand elemental starts channeling his power of sand into you. You feel its might as nearby dunes start coming your way like a tidal waves. You realize that the elemental is not happy with you and start to run. You barely escape before being trapped in shifting sands.
What have i done wrong ?
It's a tradition to have Tidesages bless land and ships. Their blessings bring rain and bountiful hauls.
I will send letter to the Shrine of the Storm.
After a week of waiting one of the Tidesages have arrived. Calling upon the power of Tidemother to bless our land and the ships which will surely bring prosperity to our lands.
Excellent.
After a week of waiting a group of Tidesages have arrived. The called upon the power of Tidemother to bless our land and the ships, which will surely bring prosperity to our lands.
Excellent.
Night Elves have worshiped goddess Elune since time immemorial. Now you're the one that's focused in prayer. What will you ask of the Moon Goddess ?
I ask for your protection Mother Moon.
It seems like your prayers have been answered. You can feel the warm moonlight shining on you and all doubts and worries leave your mind.
Praise Elune.
You're enveloped in the moonlight and can feel power of Elune coursing throught your body. It looks like Mother Moon favours you especially.
Praise Elune.

The ritual takes place on a hill in deep forest. The view of starry sky is breathtaking from here but your contemplation is interrupted when large shadowy creatures emerge from the forest. You quickly realize that it's pack that agreed to give you the gift of blood. You bow before he Alpha and nervously wait to see what happens. He looks at you for a moment before cutting his his vein and extending his bleeding arm to you.
Drink the blood.
All of tribe have gathered to honor the twin gods, Ursoc and Ursol. You stand before shaman who asks you which brother blessing you seek.
I seek Ursoc's strength.
I seek Ursol's wisdom.

Ritual festivities had taken whole night. After hours of ceremonies and offerings you kneel before the totems of Ursoc and Ursol. You can feel something changing in you. Shaman walks up to you and tells you that you have granted the blessing.
I will not dissapoint Ursoc.
I will not dissapoint Ursol.
You have decided to seek out an Ancient Guardian and ask for their blessing. Which one will you try to find?
I will seek out Ashamane.
I will seek out Aviana.
I will seek out Ursoc.
More.
You have decided to seek out an Ancient Guardian and ask for their blessing. Which one will you try to find?
I will seek out Goldrinn.
I will seek out Malorne.
More.

You have decided to try and gain Ashamane's blessing. A powerful Wild God panther has died during War of the Ancients but her spirit lives on in Emerald Dream. By departing on spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with her spirit and gain her blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living with the sabers in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts a large transparent panther appears before you. You instantly realize it's Ashamane. She praises your dedication and bestows her blessing on you. She then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not dissapoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Ashamane. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try and gain Aviana's blessing. The Mistress of the Mother Tree has died during War of the Ancients but her spirit lives on in Emerald Dream. By departing on spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with her spirit and gain her blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living with the different birds of prey in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts a large transparent harpy appears before you. You instantly realize it's Avana. She praises your dedication and bestows her blessing on you. She then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not dissapoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Aviana. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try and gain Ursoc's blessing. The Bear Lord has died during War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in Emerald Dream. By departing on spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living with the bears in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts a large transparent bear appears before you. You instantly realize it's Ursoc. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing on you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not dissapoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Ursoc. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in few years.

You have decided to try and gain Goldrinn's blessing. The Great Wolf has died during War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in Emerald Dream. By departing on spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living with the wolves in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. After one of the hunts a large transparent wolf appears before you. You instantly realize it's Goldrinn. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing on you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not dissapoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Goldrinn. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.

You have decided to try and gain Malorne's blessing. The White Stag has died during War of the Ancients but his spirit lives on in Emerald Dream. By departing on spiritual journey to the wilds you may be able to communicate with his spirit and gain his blessing.
I will depart immediately.

After spending weeks living with the deer in the wilds you feel attuned with their way of life. One day a large transparent stag appears before you. You instantly realize it's Malorne. He praises your dedication and bestows his blessing on you. He then vanishes leaving you with your newfound strength.
I will not dissapoint you.
Despite spending weeks in the wilds you have still failed to create any connection with Malorne. It seems like the Wild God has decided to ignore you.
I should just give up and try again in a few years.
You've been restless for the whole day, eagerly awaiting the dusk. At last the moment has come, you let out a powerful howl before running off to the wilds.
The hunt begins.
After some time of hunting you had finally picked up a scent. You follow it to large swath of bushes. Your prey finnaly realizes your presence and jumps out of thicket trying to escape.
It's a nimble deer !
It's a majestic stag !
It's a huge bear !
It's a pathetic sheep ?!
You run after the deer trying to catch youre prey. It's fast but no match for your speed. After a few dozen seconds you finally catch up to it and plunge your fangs into its neck.
OWOOOOOOOOOO !

You run after the stag trying to catch youre prey. Suddenly it turns around and starts charging at you. You barely dodge and grab it by the neck. The beast tries to fight but after a few seconds of struggle you snap it neck, nearly tearing his head from the rest of the body.
OWOOOOOOOOOO !

You run after the bear trying to catch your prey. After a few seconds the beast realizes that it will not escape and tries to fight. It stand on two legs and attacks you with its claws. The fight is long and bloody but the mighty beast finally falls before you. You pick it up with monstrous strength and release powerful howl.
OWOOOOOOOOOO !
You quickly catch the sheep and shred it to pieces. It's a miserable prey, not worthy of your hunting skills.
Pathetic.
The harvest_witches are known for their nature magic, but they're also a powerful alchemists. What type of potion would you ask harvest-witch to make ?
I want to be more persuasive.
I want to be stronger.
I want to be thrifter.
More.
The harvest_witches are known for their nature magic, but they're also a powerful alchemists. What type of potion would you ask harvest-witch to make ?
I want to be more cunning.
I want to be wiser.
More.
After a few days a harvest-witch arrives at your court with the elixir. She presents it to you and assures you of it effects and that it's safe.
I feel like i could convince Sargeras to stop the Burning Crusade.
I feel like i could wrestle with Deathwing.
I feel like i could scam Gallywix.
I feel like i could assasinate Garona.
I feel like i could beat Medivh in chess.
You start your journey to Moonglade, the sacred place of druidism. It's a tradition for young druids to learn Cat Form from the Great Cat Spirit who lives there.
I shall depart immediately.

After a long journey you have arrived at the Moonglade. The beauty of this place is breathtaking and the serenity of Lake Elune'ara makes you feel at home here. For a moment you alomost forget why you're here.
I shall seek out Great Cat Spirit.
After a few hours of searching the wilds you notice a large transparent panther near the lake.
I should try to approach him.

The cat spirit looks upon you with a calm and peaceful gaze, You hear a voice speak to you as though it was coming from the cat, but the creature makes no indication that it is speaking. "Greetings, my young friend. If you have come to me seeking guidance, then perhaps I can help you find what you seek."
What do you represent, spirit ?

I represent the agility which bolsters you as a young druid. You have come to me to learn this power young one, and I will teach this to you. I will teach you all that is the spirit cat, provided you will listen and understand. In order to know what it means to draw upon my spirit, you need to understand the importance of the quickness of the body, as well as the resolve of the heart.
I seek to understand the importance of quickness of the body.

Power of the body is the power and swiftness of action. You must keep yourself fit at all times, both physically and mentally. The cat's slenderness highlights its agility as it is a ferocious foe in combat. The cat's slenderness, however, belies its tough body and calm mind. These are surprises you will use to your advantage. You must rely on the slenderness of the cat's body in order to master the way of the claw.
I seek to understand the importance of resolve of the heart.

Resolve of the heart is what gives you the swiftness to take action... action that is rooted in intents that are pure and forthright. To keep the balance is not to be complacent or banal. You must show resolve for that which you believe in, and you must be willing to fight for it. The mother cat shows endless conviction in protecting her young, as does an elder cat protecting his hunting grounds. It is this resolve, this resolve of the heart, which you must come to know if you are to master the way of the Claw.
I have heard your words, Great Cat Spirit, and I understand. Give me now your blessings to fully learn the way of the Claw.

It remains to be seen if you are ready, young one. Even the wisest and oldest of druids are never truly ready when their ultimate time of testing comes. You have heard my words, and now you must move on. Heed what I have taught you. There will be a time when you will have your power tested. You must face your foe as the cat would - with quickness of body and with resolve of the heart. Learn from the fight, young one. Go... with my blessings.
I will stay true to the way of the Claw.
You start your journey to Moonglade, the sacred place of druidism. It's a tradition for young druids to learn Cat Form from the Great Bear Spirit who lives there.
I shall depart immediately.

After a long journey you have arrived at the Moonglade. The beauty of this place is breathtaking and the serenity of Lake Elune'ara makes you feel at home here. For a moment you alomost forget why you're here.
I shall seek out Great Bear Spirit.
After a few hours of searching the wilds you notice a large transparent bear near the lake.
I should try to approach him.

The bear spirit looks upon you with a calm and peaceful gaze, You hear a voice speak to you as though it was coming from the bear, but the creature makes no indication that it is speaking. "Greetings, my young friend. If you have come to me seeking guidance, then perhaps I can help you find what you seek."
What do you represent, spirit ?

I represent the strength which bolsters you as a young druid. You have come to me to learn this strength, young one, and I will teach this to you. I will teach you all that is the spirit bear, provided you will listen and understand. In order to know what it means to draw upon my spirit, you need to understand the importance of the strength of the body, as well as the strength of the heart.
I seek to understand the importance of strength of the body.

Strength of the body is the power and swiftness of action. You must keep yourself fit at all times, both physically and mentally. The bear's girth highlights its strength, as it is a ferocious foe in combat. The bear's girth, however, belies its lithe agility and sharp mind. These are surprises you will use to your advantage. You must rely on the strength of the bear's body in order to master the way of the claw.
I seek to understand the importance of strength of the heart.

Strength of the heart is what gives you the resolve to take action... action that is rooted in intents that are pure and forthright. To keep the balance is not to be complacent or banal. You must show resolve for that which you believe in, and you must be willing to fight for it. The mother bear shows endless conviction in protecting her young, as does an elder bear protecting his den. It is this resolve, this strength of heart, which you must come to know if you are to master the way of the Claw.
I have heard your words, Great Bear Spirit, and I understand. Give me now your blessings to fully learn the way of the Claw.

It remains to be seen if you are ready, young one. Even the wisest and oldest of druids are never truly ready when their ultimate time of testing comes. You have heard my words, and now you must move on. Heed what I have taught you. There will be a time when you will have your strength tested. You must face your foe as the bear would - with strength of body and with strength of heart. Learn from the fight, young one. Go... with my blessings.
I will stay true to the way of the Claw.

Mistery of flight are only known to most talented druids. Your best chance of learning them would be to seek out a Druid of the Talon. These masters of flight are the most ardent followers of Aviana and know all the secrets of the Talon Form. They commonly live in high altitude areas where their connection with Mistress of Birds is the strongest.
Which way to the highest mountain ?
After long journey you finally arrived at the foot of a mountain. Climbing such a enormous peak is no easy matter and you decide it's best to make camp and spend the night here.
I need a good sleep to climb that mountain.

You're waken up by loud caws outside your tent. You leave it quickly to look for a culprit but the crow is nowhere to be found. You're confused by this situation. How can a simple crow elude an experienced druid such as yourself ?
Maybe it's a sign ?

After weird wakeup you eat a modest breakfast and start climbing the mountain. You estimate that it will take you a few hours to reach it's peak. You can only hope that there's actually a Druid of the Talon living there.
I wish i could fly to the top.

It's nearly dark but you have finally arrived at the mountain's peak. You're tired and dream only of warm bed back home. And then you suddenly hear a loud caw behind you. It's a crow but not an ordinary one. It's several times bigger and a lot more deadlier. It looks at you and then transforms into a tall night elf. You can see by his appearance that he's person you've looking for.
I should talk to him.

You approach him and introduce yourself shortly. He looks at you intensely with his sharp eyes before opening his mouths. "I know what you seek my friend. Mysteries of the flight are only known to a select few and i can see in you potential to join them."
I will prove that i'm worthy.

Prove ? No my friend, there's no need for that. There is no exam to pass, no challenge to complete, no problem to overcome. I will pass onto you my knowledge and if you're worthy you will understand it.
Then i'm ready to learn.

Good, my friend. Then i will tell you the secret of flight. It's knowing the true meaning of freedom. As a druid it's your duty to protect Azeroth. You can't just fly away from your obligations and hide in the clouds. The only thing that's limiting your freedom is you. Your doubts, concerns and fears chained you to the earth. True freedom is facing them head on and standing your ground instead of flying away like a coward. This is the mystery of flight. Now take to the skies and feel how free you are !
CAAAAAAW !

You have been studying ways of druidism for many years now. You practiced shapeshifting and attained complete control over it's many forms. But now you choose a new objecitve. To master the way of the stag is to follow Malorne himself. Father of demigod Cenarius. Lover of Elune. First among Ancient Guardians. Following his example is not easy and rarely anyone tries it. You will face many challenges and succes is not guaranted.
I will do my best.
To master ways of Malorne you have to gain blessing of the demigod himself. You will depart on a long journey to understand him and his ways.
I will depart immediately.
I already bear his blessing.
You have gained blessing of Malorne and will now face a final test. You will undergo a ritual to relive Malornes memories from War of the Ancients and face Archimonde the Defiler.
I will not fail him.

The ritual has begun. As the world swirls around you the vision blurs and you start to hear weird sounds. You see the Defiler before you. Overcome with rage and fury you charge at him with your antlers. The ground trembles under your hooves as you sweep demons aside. You reach your enemy and he barely dodges your attack, saving himself from being impaled. You exhange blows for hours and you you're getting more and more tired with each passing moment. Archimonde notices it and grabs your neck with his demonic strength. You struggle to free yourself but to no avail. He snaps your neck and as you leave the vision the last thing you hear is powerful roar of furious Ysera.
I still weep for the White Stag.

You have overcome the Malornes challenge and gained insight about his being. With all these things you have strengthened your connection with the Waywatcher and mastered the Stag Form. You will use this power as Malorne himself would. To defend Azeroth and its inhabitants.
I will always follow your example.

You spend years staying true to the light and your duties. In doing this you gained a immense wisdom and experience. You can channel it into writing a libram, the holiest type of book. It will strengthen your connection to Light and those that will wield it after you.
I will write about protecting others.
I will write about delivery of retribution.
I will write about staying justful.
I will write about importance of faith.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how protecting others is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how delivering retribution is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how being just is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.

After days and nights of pouring yor thoughts and faith onto the paper the work is completed. The book tells how being pious is paladins first duty and it emanates aura of Light that will strengthen its wielder.
I will stay true to my words.
As a master of runic magic you can use your powers to forge a runeblade. It will strengthen you and you will be able to channel your powers throught it.

Nathrezim are known for their smithing skills and have forged many powerful runeblades in history. Weapons like Frostmourne and Apocalypse are examples of your race abilitities. Now you can use this abilities to forge a powerful blade for yourself.
As a master of runic magic you can use your powers to forge a runeblade. It will strengthen you and you will be able to channel your powers throught it.

Nathrezim are known for their smithing skills and have forged many powerful runeblades in history. Weapons like Frostmourne and Apocalypse are examples of your race abilitities. Now you can use this abilities to forge a powerful blade for yourself.
I will forge a blade empowered by unholy magic.
I will forge a blade empowered by blood magic.
I will forge a blade empowered by frost magic.
After many nights spent forging and channeling unholy magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
After many nights spent forging and channeling blood magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
After many nights spent forging and channeling frost magic into the metal you have finished your blade. It emanates dark energies that will surely bring death to your enemies.
Now nothing can stop me.
You have been elected to lead Cenarion Circle.
I will do my best (You will lose all your current lands if not vassal of Cenarion Circle).
I'm not worthy.

The Emerald Dream is a vast, ever-changing spirit world, that exists outside the boundaries of the physical world. The Emerald Dream represents how the world would have been, if intelligent beings had not altered its surface. It is a druids duty to spend time in this realm.
I will enter the Dream.
I still have something to do.
After spending somethis in the Dream you started to feel a little homesick. Maybe it's time to leave this beatiful realm and go back to Azeroth ?
It's time to leave the Dream.
No, i will spend more time here.

Elune's favor to you, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

Druids true home is the Emerald Dream. You should leave the material realm behind and venture there.


Signed, Archdruid [From.GetFirstName]
Request to rank up.

Has §YHarmony§! greater or equal to 1000 and is at least an Apprentice Druid.
Has §YHarmony§! greater or equal to 3000 and is at least an Skilled Druid.

Has §YDevotion§! greater or equal to 1000 and is at least an Apprentice Priest.

Ancients Seed
Ancient
Ancient
Ancient of Lore
Ancient of War
Ancient of Wind
Ancient Protector
Ancients are giant, sentient demigod-like trees that serve as protectors of nature. They were among the first creatures of Azeroth, the first guardians of its life.
Ancient of Lore
A type of ancient, the ancients of lore are the keepers of wisdom, and the living keys necessary to unlock nature's most guarded secrets.
Ancient of War
One of the toughest types of ancient, Ancients of War train night elves in the arts of weaponry.
Ancient of Wind

Ancients of Wind, or Ancients of the wind, are able to tap into the more feral side of nature. Ancients of wind avoid combat but like other ancients, when enemies threaten nature, they battle with their allies.
You were walking in the forest when something fell from one of your branches. You lean to pick it up. In your hand you hold a little seed.
I need to take care of it.
After many years of taking care of the little seed something awakened in it. From the broken seed sprouted a little Ancient.
New life is born.
Summon Ancient
Summon one of the powerful protectors of the forest.
Ancients are powerful guardians of the forest. There are many different types of them and they have different strengths. You can choose what type of Ancient you would like to summon to your court.
Ancient of War.
Ancient of Lore.
Ancient of Wind.

Elune's favor to you, [Root.GetTitledFirstName].

We are delighted by your decision to join ranks of Cenarion Circle. Together we will strive to maintain balance and spread teachings of Cenarius.


Signed, Archdruid [From.GetFirstName].
It is a great honor, Archdruid.

Signed, Archdruid [From.GetFirstName].

I'm happy with your advancements in understanding of nature and hereby grant you a rank that is more representative of your knowledge.

Ancients are powerful beings that supported Cenarion Circle for thousands of years. As a member of it you can ask one of them to grant you their blessing.
I will ask an Ancient of War.
I will ask an Ancient of Lore.

After the taking of city your troops start sacrificing its population to the Lords of Twilight. Streets are flooded with blood and screams of innocents blend into symphony of terror. The madness has come to this land.
Glory to the Gods Below.
Hide this event.

Sisterhood of Elune has existed since beggining of the Kaldorei civilization. The all-female organization is dedicated to worshipining and serving the moon goddes, Elune. Sending the girl to join them would be her a great honor for her. Nonetheless she would leave your court and probably never return.
She will serve the Goddess.
I changed my mind.
Host of C'Thun has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Qiraji and Silithid will support you in destroying enemies of your Master.
Glory to C'Thun.
Host of the N'Zoth has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Naga and other dark minions will support you in destroying enemies of your Master.
Glory to N'Zoth.
Host of Yogg-Saron has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted Watchers and N'raqi will support you in destroying enemies of your Master.
Glory to Yogg-Saron.
Army of C'Thun has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Qiraji and Silithid will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
Glory to C'Thun.
Army of the N'Zoth has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Naga and K'thir will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
Glory to N'Zoth.
Army of Yogg-Saron has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted Watchers and N'raqi will support you in unleashing madness upon Azeroth.
Glory to Yogg-Saron.
Legions of C'Thun has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Qiraji and Silithid will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.
Glory to C'Thun.
Legions of the N'Zoth has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Powerful Naga and K'thir will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.
Glory to N'Zoth.
Legions of Yogg-Saron has been sent to you by the Old God himself. Corrupted Watchers and N'raqi will support you in bringing forth the Hour of Twilight.

A powerful general has been sent to you by the C'Thun himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
Glory to C'Thun.
A powerful general has been sent to you by the N'Zoth himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
Glory to N'Zoth.
A powerful general has been sent to you by the Yogg-Saron himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
Glory to Yogg-Saron.
A monstrous C'Thrax general has been sent to you by your Master himself. He will serve you well and bring ruin upon enemies of the Old God.
He will surely bring ruin upon Azeroth.

You can feel power of C'Thun all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.
I will bring ruin to enemies of C'Thun.

You can feel power of C'Thun all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.
UULL lwhuk H'IWN!

You can feel power of N'Zoth all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.
I will bring ruin to enemies of N'Zoth.

You can feel power of N'Zoth all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.
UULL lwhuk H'IWN!

You can feel power of Yogg-Saron all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. The master is pleased with you and grants you power so you can serve him better.

You can feel power of Yogg-Saron all over your body. The great eye overtakes your mind and enters the depths of your consciousness. Though the master is pleased with you, his gratitude is a little more than you can handle.

You have entered the undergrounds of Ahn'Qiraj with a small band of elite adventurers. After making it through horrific forces of C'Thun you now stand before him. The maddening whispers enter your mind as soon as you look at him. You overcome the madness and lead the charge against the Old God.
Die you monster.

C'Thun is dead. A small band of elite adventurers led by [FROM.GetBestName] has vanquished the Old God. The band has overcome his minions and cleared out the city of Ahn'Qiraj. The races of Azeroth can feel safe once again.
At last we are safe.
That is not dead which can eternal lie.

Cenarion Circle was part of Kaldorei since its beggining. It teached drudism to night elves and others that wanted to follow that path. As a new Archdruid you can decide on changing that policy. What is your choice ?
Cenarion Circle will always be part of Kaldorei.
Cenarion Circle must stay neutral.
